trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_00<tab>Raubahn means to entrust you with a task of the utmost import.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_01<tab>Appointing you his personal envoy, Raubahn bids you deliver a missive to the other two leaders of the Eorzean Alliance. In order to facilitate your journey, he bestows upon you an airship pass, which will allow you to travel by air between the three allied nations. Before making your way to the airship landing, be sure to quiz Momodi as to what awaits beyond the deserts of Thanalan.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_02<tab>In addition to Ul'dah, the Eorzean Alliance encompasses the city<var 1F /var>states of Gridania and Limsa Lominsa. Once you have made your final preparations for the journey, take the Wellhead Lift to the airship landing and speak with Elyenora at the entrance lobby.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_03<tab>You are now ready to embark upon the first leg of your journey, which will take you to Limsa Lominsa. Make your way to the landing area and await departure.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_04<tab>Having safely arrived in Limsa Lominsa, you must now seek an audience with the Admiral. Ask the storm honor guard for assistance.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_05<tab>The Admiral awaits you in her command room on the Bridge. Take the Crow's Lift to Bulwark Hall, and present Raubahn's missive to Zanthael before the Admiral's Lift to gain admission.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_06<tab>Admiral Bloefhiswyn is receptive to the proposal detailed in Raubahn's missive. It appears the Garlean Empire still poses a grave threat to Eorzea, with the XIVth Imperial Legion, led by Legatus Gaius van Baelsar, deeply entrenched in the border regions. Your business in Limsa Lominsa successfully concluded, make your way to the airship landing and speak with L'nophlo.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_07<tab>You are now ready to embark upon the second leg of your journey, which will take you to Gridania. Make your way to the landing area and await departure.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_08<tab>Having safely arrived in Gridania, you must now seek an audience with the Elder Seedseer. Ask the serpent honor guard for assistance.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_09<tab>The Elder Seedseer awaits you at the Lotus Stand. Make your way to Nophica's Altar within Old Gridania, and present Raubahn's missive to the silent conjurer to gain admission.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SEQ_10<tab>Having now passed on Raubahn's message to the leaders of both Limsa Lominsa and Gridania, you have discharged your duty as the Flame General's envoy, and learned of the various threats facing Eorzea in the process. Given the immensity of the forces at work, you are moved to wonder what meaningful contribution a lone adventurer might make to the realm's preservation. Perhaps the answer will be revealed to you in the days to come.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Momodi.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Elyenora at the airship landing.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_02<tab>Board the airship.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the storm honor guard.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_04<tab>Present Raubahn's missive to Zanthael at Bulwark Hall.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_05<tab>Speak with L'nophlo at the airship landing.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_06<tab>Board the airship.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_07<tab>Speak with the serpent honor guard.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_TODO_08<tab>Present Raubahn's missive to the silent conjurer at Nophica's Altar.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_1<tab>Listen well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This will take some time to explain.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_10<tab>I've prepared these letters for my counterparts in the Eorzean Alliance.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_11<tab>Five years ago, we looked on, powerless, as our brothers and sisters were taken from us at Carteneau─first by the Garleans, and then by the thrice-damned primal called forth by their treachery.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_12<tab>Not a day goes by that I do not think of my fallen comrades...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_13<tab>...And of the Warriors of Light, of whom no trace remained.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_14<tab>The tragedies of the Calamity are not so easily forgotten─nor should they be. In remembering all we've lost, we're reminded of what we still have.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_15<tab>And so I mean to mark the fifth anniversary of the Battle of Carteneau with a memorial service honoring the fallen.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_16<tab>It is my hope that my counterparts in the Alliance will agree to do the same.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_17<tab>And I would have <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> bear my words to them as my personal envoy.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_18<tab>Why you? Because your deeds mark you out as the nearest thing I have to a Warrior of Light. I can think of none more worthy of the role. The question is: will you accept it?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_19<tab>Then it is agreed!
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_20<tab>You will journey to Gridania and Limsa Lominsa as my official representative.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_21<tab>Now, that's a great many malms to travel, but I've neither the time nor patience to wait around while you do it on foot.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_22<tab>I hereby grant you permission to use the airship routes connecting the three city<var 1F /var>states. This pass serves as proof of your privilege.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_23<tab>Gone are the days when airship travel was available to all.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_24<tab>The ever-present threat of imperial attack has forced us to impose drastic restrictions out of concern for public safety.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_25<tab>These passes are only granted when circumstance demands it─as in this case.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_26<tab>Though there were <var 1A 02 /var>others<var 1A 01 /var> who insisted you be granted one regardless.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_27<tab>Aye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I am not alone in seeing it...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_28<tab>Your potential is plain.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_29<tab>But I have said enough. In the name of the sultana, I bid you go forth.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_30<tab>See for yourself the wonders of the realm for which the Warriors of Light risked all. Rise to your calling and fulfill your promise.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_31<tab>And should your path be barred by man or beast, strike fast and true, for victory belongs to the bold.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_32<tab>Now go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and heed the Crystal's guidance should you ever lose your way.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_RAUBAHN_000_35<tab>See that those letters reach the Admiral and the Elder Seedseer, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I would have all of Eorzea remember the fallen.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_40<tab>Ah! Back from your meetin' with Raubahn, are you? What did the big man have to say?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_41<tab>Is that a fact!?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_42<tab>Personal envoy of the Flame General himself!
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_43<tab>So you'll be bearin' the great man's words to the leaders of the Alliance, will you? And by airship! Bugger me...that's an honor and half, that is.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_44<tab>...But I can't think of anyone who deserves it more.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_45<tab>I'm proud of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I truly am.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_46<tab>Now, I daresay Raubahn told you this, but not many people get to go on airships, these days. In fact, most folk go to their graves havin' never once seen Eorzea from above...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_47<tab>Poor buggers shuffle off to meet Thal havin' never known the blues of Limsa Lominsa's shimmerin' seas, or the myriad greens of leafy Gridania...

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_48<tab>But not you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You'll see those sights and more, and everywhere you go, you'll find fascinatin' folk with fascinatin' tales to tell.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_49<tab>The people you meet, the places you go─savor these experiences...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_50<tab>For they are priceless, all.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_51<tab>Sayin' that, it'd be remiss of me if I didn't remind you to be careful out there.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_52<tab>Ul'dah ain't the only place beset by troubles, as you'll discover when you visit Limsa and Gridania.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_53<tab>Truth be told, that might well be exactly what the General wants you to realize. I think he knows what kind of <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_54<tab>And what kind's that, you ask? Why, the kind that can't resist stickin' <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> nose in other people's business, of course─and don't you ever go changin'!
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_55<tab>Safe travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll see you when you get back.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_60<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. This is the reservation counter for passengers traveling to Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_61<tab>If I'm not mistaken, you are the Flame General's envoy, <var 29 EB02 /var>, yes? Highwind Skyways is at your service. Will you be flying with us today?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q1_000_1<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_62<tab>Should you change your mind, you need only speak to me, and I will see to it that you are assigned a place on the next airship.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q2_000_1<tab>Board the airship?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A2_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A2_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_65<tab>Do you wish to leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q5_000_1<tab>Leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A5_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A5_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_66<tab>We hope you have a pleasant voyage.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_70<tab>The airship bound for Limsa Lominsa will be departing shortly. Are you ready to board, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_71<tab>Thank you using Highwind Skyways. The airship bound for Gridania will be departing shortly.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q6_000_1<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A6_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A6_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ELYENORA_000_72<tab>Very well. When you are ready to board, please let me know.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ANNOUNCE_000_80<tab>Attention, all passengers: the airship bound for Limsa Lominsa is about to depart. Please make your way to the boarding gate.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_NANAMOULNAMO_100_80<tab>When first we met beneath the Sultantree, I sensed there was something unusual about <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>. I wonder if they will feel the same...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_81<tab>Godsspeed, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, godsspeed!
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_82<tab>If I'm right, they'll be singin' your praises from here to the Farreach before long.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MOMODI_000_83<tab>May you always walk in the light of the Crystal...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_85<tab>Ah, you must be the envoy from Ul'dah! Welcome to Limsa Lominsa, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Admiral Bloefhiswyn awaits your arrival.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q7_000_1<tab>Leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A7_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A7_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_86<tab>Please let me know if you require any assistance.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_STORMA_000_90<tab>You are the Ul'dahn envoy? Welcome to Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_STORMA_000_91<tab>The Admiral has been looking forward to your arrival.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_STORMA_000_92<tab>Please proceed to the Crow's Lift at your earliest convenience. It will take you to Bulwark Hall.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_STORMA_000_93<tab>Once there, pray speak with Zanthael. He will be pleased to show you in to the Admiral's command room on the Bridge.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_STORMA_000_95<tab>Pray speak with Zanthael in Bulwark Hall. He will be pleased to show you in to the Admiral's command room on the Bridge.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ZANTHAEL_000_100<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, and welcome to our fair city. If you would permit me to examine the seal on the missive you carry...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_ZANTHAEL_000_101<tab>Yes, everything seems to be in order. My apologies. We cannot afford to be complacent, you understand. Please, step this way.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_800010_MERLWYB<tab>(-???-)Enter.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700020_MERLWYB<tab>So the silver-tongued merchants send an adventurer to speak for them. It appears the Ul'dahns place great faith in you.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700030_MERLWYB<tab>This way.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700040_MERLWYB<tab>I bid you welcome.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700050_MERLWYB<tab>I am Merlwyb Bloefhiswyn, Admiral of Limsa Lominsa, and commander of the Maelstrom.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700060_MERLWYB<tab>Now, what news from Thanalan?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700070_MERLWYB<tab>Before you begin, I would know your name.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700080_MERLWYB<tab>Strange. I would readily have sworn that I knew you, but it seems I was mistaken.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700090_MERLWYB<tab>If I cannot well recall the faces of my friends, I must trust in my ability to remember the faces of my enemies. Woe betide the Admiral who fails in <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_700100_MERLWYB<tab>But I jest. Please, do continue.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_110<tab>Hm. A memorial service to honor the fallen.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_111<tab>Seven hells... Has it been five years?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_112<tab>Five years since the Garlean Empire sought to wrest Eorzea from our grasp...

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_113<tab>It was in answer to the imperial threat that the city<var 1F /var>states formed the Grand Companies, and forged the Eorzean Alliance anew. But Garlemald was not content to wager all on a simple contest of martial might. They had other plans─the Meteor project.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_114<tab>Legatus Nael van Darnus─hells take him─intended to “cleanse” our realm by snatching the lesser moon, Dalamud, from the heavens and casting it down upon our heads. Desperate to prevent this lunatic scheme, we marched our forces to the Carteneau Flats and there met the VIIth Imperial Legion in battle.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_115<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Never<var 1A 01 /var> have I seen a fight like the Battle of Carteneau─and I have seen full many.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_116<tab>But though we gave no quarter, spared not one <var 1A 02 /var>onze<var 1A 01 /var> of effort...we could not prevent what followed.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_117<tab>From inside the shell of Dalamud came a winged nightmare─a dragon the size of a bloody city. 'Twas the elder primal Bahamut, bent on making an eighth hell of Eorzea.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_118<tab>In the space of a breath, the legions of the Empire were set aflame, while our own armies fared little better. 'Twas as if the whole world was burning... Words cannot well describe the scene.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_119<tab>And yet...by some miracle, a few among us were spared.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_120<tab>Even as I steeled myself for death, a blinding white light enveloped me, robbing me of my senses.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_121<tab>When I regained them, the dragon was gone, and the still-smoldering land was warped beyond all knowing.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_122<tab>Were Archon Louisoix still with us, he would doubtless shed some light on these unfathomable happenings. Alas, he is not, and I fear we will want for his wisdom in the days to come.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_123<tab>For while our nations struggle to recover from the devastation, the beastmen call forth their damned primals to torment us anew.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_124<tab>Unless we put aside our differences and rebuild <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>, our foes will catch us unprepared.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_125<tab>And I speak not only of the beastmen. Do not imagine that the Empire has forsaken its claim on Eorzea. The imperials crowd our borders, waiting to strike.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_126<tab>Damn it all, we need champions to replace those we lost...

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_127<tab>But such thoughts are worse than worthless. Time is short, and none will save us, save ourselves. It is the duty of every soul who survived the Calamity to work together for the good of Eorzea...and this memorial service may be the very thing to unite us.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_128<tab>Aye, Raubahn has the right of it. I accept his proposal.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_129<tab>Your duty is done here, adventurer─I will see to it that the Flame General receives my reply.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_130<tab>You travel next to Gridania, yes?

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_131<tab>Pray give my regards to the Elder Seedseer. Oh, and tell her the wolf has been sniffing around the stables. A private jest─and one in poor taste─but I would have you tell it all the same.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MERLWYB_000_132<tab>Fare you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. May the Navigator guide you on your journey.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_000_140<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. This is the counter for passengers traveling to Gridania.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_000_141<tab>A pleasure to serve you again, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Are you ready to board the airship to Gridania?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q3_000_1<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A3_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A3_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_000_145<tab>Very well, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I'll be glad to assist you when you're ready.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q4_000_1<tab>Board the airship?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A4_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A4_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_000_146<tab>Do you wish to leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q8_000_1<tab>Leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A8_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A8_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_100_146<tab>We hope you have a pleasant voyage.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_000_147<tab>Are you ready to depart, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? The airship bound for Gridania will be leaving shortly.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q9_000_1<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A9_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A9_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_LNOPHLO_100_147<tab>Very well, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I'll be glad to assist you when you're ready.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_150<tab>Ah, you must be the envoy from Ul'dah! Welcome to Gridania, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. The Elder Seedseer awaits your arrival.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_Q10_000_1<tab>Leave the landing area?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A10_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_A10_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_CABINCREW_000_151<tab>Please let me know if you require any assistance.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SERPENT_000_160<tab>Greetings, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SERPENT_000_161<tab>You are the Ul'dahn envoy, are you not? I have received instructions to assist you.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SERPENT_000_162<tab>Pray make your way into the city proper, and identify yourself to the conjurer at Nophica's Altar. She will admit you to the Lotus Stand, where the Elder Seedseer awaits.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SERPENT_000_165<tab>Pray make your way into the city proper, and identify yourself to the conjurer at Nophica's Altar. She will admit you to the Lotus Stand, where the Elder Seedseer awaits.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MONK_000_170<tab>You are the Ul'dahn envoy? Begging your pardons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but might I inspect the missive you bear?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_MONK_000_171<tab>Verily, this is the seal of the supreme commander of the Immortal Flames. Please come with me.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900110_KANESENNA<tab>So you are the Ul'dahn envoy.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900120_KANESENNA<tab>On behalf of our fair nation, I bid you welcome.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900130_KANESENNA<tab>Please.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900140_KANESENNA<tab>Allow me to introduce myself.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900150_KANESENNA<tab>I am Kan-E-Senna, Elder Seedseer of Gridania, and leader of the Order of the Twin Adder, our nation's Grand Company.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900160_KANESENNA<tab>I understand you bear a message from the Flame General.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900170_KANESENNA<tab>But...before you begin, might I behold your face more closely?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900180_KANESENNA<tab>My apologies. It is just that you put me in mind of someone I once knew─a brave and noble soul.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_900190_KANESENNA<tab>But come, let us return to the matter at hand.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_180<tab>A remembrance service for the fallen of Carteneau...
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_181<tab>Pray tell me, adventurer─what do you know of our conflict with the Empire?
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_182<tab>It would seem my counterparts recounted the tale in some detail. That is well.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_183<tab>Hm? A message from the Admiral? ...A wolf has been sniffing around her stables, you say? I see. Well, I shall be pleased to provide her with such counsel as I am able.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_184<tab>But first, friend of my friend, I would tell you more of the Garlean threat.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_185<tab>For the greater part of its history, Garlemald was not even among the most influential nations in Ilsabard, the northern continent. However, its innovations in the field of magitek, some fifty years past, helped to raise it from the depths of obscurity.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_186<tab>Emboldened by this technology, it set about subjugating its neighbors, swiftly absorbing each into its ever-expanding territory. And when all of Ilsabard lay within its grasp, it turned its ravenous gaze upon Eorzea.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_187<tab>Yet Garlemald's transformation did not come about by virtue of magitek alone. Its success owed much to the consummate leadership of its first and reigning emperor.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_188<tab>Solus zos Galvus─the man who built an empire in his own lifetime. Yet he has lived long, and after more than four score winters, it is said that he grows frail, and ever more prone to illness.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_189<tab>If rumors are to be believed, the matter of succession has destabilized the imperial court. This would explain the Empire's relative inactivity in recent years, which has granted us much-needed time to rebuild.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_190<tab>Yet we cannot allow ourselves to become complacent, for Garlemald still maintains a presence in Eorzea, in the form of the XIVth Imperial Legion.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_191<tab>Commanding this great host is Legatus Gaius van Baelsar, a man whose ambitions are well known to us. So long as he breathes Eorzean air, none of us may sleep easy.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_192<tab>The Calamity wreaked such devastation upon the realm that it has been all we could do to nurse our wounds, never mind rebuild our defenses. Simply put, we have not the strength to repel the Empire.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_193<tab>To add to our woes, the beast tribes continue to summon their primals, whose very existence is a bane upon the land.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_194<tab>Each nation is beset with its own primal problem; none has the resources to look beyond its own borders.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_195<tab>The Admiral desires my counsel regarding a brazen wolf.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_196<tab>She means to tell me that the Empire may soon resume its advance.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_197<tab>Though the primals pose an undeniable threat to our survival, the threat posed by the Garleans is greater still. Clearly, each nation can no longer afford to think only of that which occurs within its own borders.

TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_198<tab>A storm gathers upon the horizon. If we are to weather it, we must needs stand united once more. A remembrance service may help to rekindle the spirit of unity which brought the peoples of Eorzea together when last the Empire threatened our liberty.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_199<tab>The Flame General was wise to make his proposal, and I wholeheartedly approve of it. The necessary provisions shall be made for a service here in Gridania.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_200<tab>Your work here is done, my friend. I shall send my reply to the Flame General forthwith.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_KANESENNA_000_201<tab>I thank you for coming. May the Twelve see you safely home.
TEXT_MANWIL200_00528_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>You may now make use of the airship routes connecting the three nations. Before you may board an airship, you must pay the requisite fare in gil.
